sentence.Network_en: The government could be caught flat-footed.
He told me I was flat-footed.
They were caught flat-footed by the attack.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们冷不防遭到了攻击。

扁平足又称平足症(flat foot)指任何骨、韧带、肌肉生理异常，导致足内则、外则纵弓和横弓出现塌陷或消失，都为平足症。其病因可 …

entry.def: If you are flat-footed, the arches of your feet are too low.

example.ex: All babies look flat-footed and when they walk the whole sole touches the ground...
example.tran: 婴儿们看上去都是平足，他们走路的时候整个脚掌都着地。

example.ex: He told me I was flat-footed.

entry.def: If you describe a person or action as flat-footed, you think they are clumsy, awkward, or foolish.

example.ex: The government could be caught flat-footed.

means.word_mean: 1. with feet flat on the ground; not tiptoe
2. unprepared and unable to react quickly;

sentences.sentence: "the new product caught their competitors flat-footed"

means.word_mean: 3. having broad flat feet that usually turn outward;

auth_sentence.content: When he canters, other horses are flat out.
